title: Wish I could ask for my money and 2hrs of my life back
review: Really not that much to say. This is one of those films that I would much rather rent, at which point I could have fast-forwarded through everything. The story did not peak at any point. Incredibly disappointing. When the film ended you could hear people in the cinema saying 'that's it?'Granted, some of the emotional scenes were quite good and the actors are all decent. However, this is one where the production is to blame. The director clearly had no clue what he was doing.The two previous ones were much better. This might actually explain why the cinemas are getting emptier by the year...
